choose.when: AND B.QUESTION_SEQ IN (SELECT SEQ FROM QUESTION WHERE NAME TITLE '%'||TRIM(#{text})||'%')
AND B.CLASS_SEQ IN (SELECT SEQ FROM CLASS WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||TRIM(#{text})||'%')
AND A.STUDENT_SEQ IN (SELECT SEQ FROM STUDENT WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||TRIM(#{text})||'%')

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SURVEY A, STUDENT B WHERE A.STUDENT_SEQ = B.SEQ

SELECT QUESTION_SEQ, GET_QUESTION_NAME(QUESTION_SEQ) AS QUESTION_NAME, STUDENT_SEQ, GET_STUDENT_NAME(STUDENT_SEQ) AS STUDENT_NAME, CLASS_SEQ, GET_CLASS_NAME(CLASS_SEQ) AS CLASS_NAME, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT A.QUESTION_SEQ, A.STUDENT_SEQ, A.REG_DT, B.CLASS_SEQ FROM SURVEY A, STUDENT B WHERE A.STUDENT_SEQ = B.SEQ
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC ) A OFFSET (#{pageIndex} - 1) * #{pageSize} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT A.QUESTION_SEQ, A.STUDENT_SEQ, GET_STUDENT_NAME(A.STUDENT_SEQ) AS STUDENT_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, B.TITLE, B.DETAIL, GET_ADMIN_NAME(B.ADMIN_SEQ) AS ADMIN_NAME FROM SURVEY A, QUESTION B WHERE A.QUESTION_SEQ = B.SEQ AND A.QUESTION_SEQ = #{question_seq} AND A.STUDENT_SEQ = #{student_seq}
